name: Sir Sprintsalot
description:
The monsters are on the loose again! And the only one who can save them? You guessed it- Sir Sprintsalot.

Sir Sprintsalot is a retro styled 8-bit pixel platformer/runner. Sir Sprintsalot has all kinds of weapons at his disposal- swords, axes, whips, all that kind of stuff. Even some magic! Run through 32 levels with unique goals across 8 different worlds with unique enemies and challenges. Earn coins to buy more weapons and spells to destroy all the monsters and purge of the land of evil! 

Features:
- Addictive runner-style gameplay
- Sweet, sweet pixel art
- Retro sound effects
- 6 different melee weapons
- 6 different ranged weapons
- Magic spells
- Fire-breathing dragons
- Yetis!
- Simple touch controls that can be customized
